ygData.subject: Giant Lag Spikes....
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey all, (Am tired of the post all your Dxdiag info here and we ll not comment back to you... so I thought I would post here.) I have a P4 1.4, 656 Meg
ygData.messageBody:
Hey all,

(Am tired of the "post all your Dxdiag info here and we'll not comment
back to you..." so I thought I would post here.)

I have a P4 1.4, 656 Meg memory, 64 Mb GeoForce 2 card w latest
drivers. Sometimes, when just sitting about, my lag goes to 90% and
sits there. Sometimes I go LD and sometimes I recover. Have seen it
happen on a variety of zones.

Am on a cable modem via linksys router but it doesn't happen to my
wife (on another port/machine). I dont have any other processes
running (only Explorer, killed the rest) and 20 Gb disk free.

Thoughts?

Andrew

ps Am going to do the data rate fix.
